heading: Koto ensembles.
general-note: Here are entered compositions not in a specific form or of a specific type for ten or more solo kotos and collections of compositions in several forms or types for various numbers of solo kotos..
Compositions for fewer than ten solo kotos are entered under. Plucked instrument trios (Kotos (3)); Plucked instrument quartets (Kotos (4));. and similar headings..
When used for an accompanying ensemble in headings, the term "koto ensemble" stands for two or more solo kotos..
